name: Commonwealth ex rel. Johnson, Appellant, v. Myers
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Johnson v. Myers

judges: Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Beien and Bobeets, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Johnson, Appellant, v. Myers.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Cueiam,
In light of the decisions of this Court in Commonwealth ex rel. Cunningham v. Maroney, 421 Pa. 157, 218 A. 2d 811 (1966); Commonwealth ex rel. Branam v. Myers, 420 Pa. 77, 216 A. 2d 89 (1966); Commonwealth ex rel. Robinson v. Myers, 420 Pa. 72, 215 A. 2d 637 (1966); Commonwealth ex rel. Stevens v. Myers, 419 Pa. 1, 213 A. 2d 613 (1865), the order of the court below is vacated and the record remanded for consideration of the contention contained in appellant’s petition that he was denied his constitutional right to the assistance of counsel on appeal. Cf. Douglas v. California, 372 U.S. 353, 83 S. Ct. 814 (1963).
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Cueiam,

attorneys: Leonard Johnson, appellant, in propria persona.
Ronald M. McOaskill and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Johnson, Appellant, v. Myers.
Submitted April 19, 1966.
Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Beien and Bobeets, JJ.
Leonard Johnson, appellant, in propria persona.
Ronald M. McOaskill and Joseph M. Smith, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
June 24, 1966:
